casebody.data:
RESPIRATORY BOARD
v.
MEDICAL CORP. No. 256P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 4, 2007. Sarah M. Johnson, for Medical Group. William R. Shenton, Christopher P. Brewer, Raleigh, for Respiratory Board.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st day of May 2007 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of June 2007."
